title: I work my ass off for 12 hours a day just to play one or two games of this.
body:
Before comments start rolling in, yes this was ranked flex, and the reason I play on ranked flex is for the fact that I like to play with multiple friends in a "sort of" ranked environment, that way the game is a little more hard.

https://i.imgur.com/AusvxGs.png

I get a trio queue who literally troll their asses off. Legit, I had a Vi support with Teleport and smite who took my red buff level 1, died immediately after because she invaded the enemy jungle level 2, then had my gnar top who went AP and fed his ass off. 

You wanna know the response I got? "Who cares it's a fucking game people have too much time on their hands". Yeah, except you're literally holding 2 players who aren't a part of your Nazi group who are trying to win the fucking game, and I can't even leave because I'll just get punished for it.

Real fun game sometimes man, it's just not even worth logging in anymore.
